kv2.4:0.4_0: Discussion of the passing away and Self
kv2.4:1.1_0: and there is a perfected one.
kv2.4:1.3_0: One who is not a perfected one. They don’t know the destiny of others, the native spirits, the Lord of others, and the members of the opposite sex. They don’t know what is unaffected.
kv2.4:10.11_0: Do not free of greed, hate, and delusion,
kv2.4:10.14_0: And he’s perfected, free of greed, hate, and delusion, and has realized the proper conduct that should be realized.
kv2.4:10.1_0: and there is a perfected one.
kv2.4:10.5_0: They’ve cut off the root, made like a palm stump, obliterated, and unable to arise in the future.
kv2.4:10.6_0: the path leading to giving up greed ...
kv2.4:11.1_0: and there is a perfected one.
kv2.4:11.2_0: There is no-one who is skilled in the sound of another’s own volition.
kv2.4:11.3_0: There is an expert on the Teaching by others,
kv2.4:11.5_0: There is a perfected one and other of others:
kv2.4:12.1_0: Other sects are no-one who speaks contrary to the Teaching.
kv2.4:12.3_0: There’s no-one who’s own vomited to another.
kv2.4:13.1_0: Is’ve given up greed, hate, and delusion, and have given them up?
kv2.4:13.3_0: Through what is unskillful and one who has given up greed,
kv2.4:14.10_0: I’ve realized that be realized by his own wealth?
kv2.4:14.12_0: one free of greed, hate, and delusion, and one without greed, hate, and delusion.
kv2.4:14.13_0: I’ve realized that be realized by his own wealth?
kv2.4:14.4_0: the path leading to giving up greed ...
kv2.4:14.9_0: Free of greed, hate, and delusion, free of greed, hate, and delusion for those free of greed, hate, and delusion.
kv2.4:15.1_0: and haven’t given up greed for others,
kv2.4:15.3_0: Did you give up greed and hate to others,
kv2.4:16.11_0: Free of greed, hate, and delusion, free of greed, hate, and delusion for those free of greed, hate, and delusion.
kv2.4:16.3_0: the path leading to giving up greed ...
kv2.4:16.8_0: one free of greed, hate, and delusion, and one without greed, hate, and delusion.
kv2.4:17.10_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv2.4:17.1_0: and there is a perfected one.
kv2.4:17.4_0: “Mendicants, I say that the ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees, not for one who does not know or see.
kv2.4:17.5_0: For one who knows and sees what?
kv2.4:17.7_0: The ending of the defilements is for one who knows and sees this.”
kv2.4:18.12_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv2.4:18.1_0: and there is a perfected one.
kv2.4:18.4_0: “Mendicants, I say that the ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees, not for one who does not know or see.
kv2.4:18.5_0: For one who knows and sees what?
kv2.4:18.6_0: The ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path. ...
kv2.4:18.8_0: ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.’
kv2.4:18.9_0: The ending of the defilements is for one who knows and sees this.”
kv2.4:19.1_0: and there is a perfected one.
kv2.4:19.4_0: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding all, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
kv2.4:19.5_0: By directly knowing and completely understanding the all, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
kv2.4:19.8_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv2.4:2.1_0: Don’t you have any virtue of another, nor does you know the destiny of others?
kv2.4:2.3_0: If he doesn’t know the counselor of others, nor does he know the destiny of others—be they don’t know.
kv2.4:20.1_0: and there is a perfected one.
kv2.4:20.5_0: and unable to make six grave crimes.”
kv2.4:20.8_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv2.4:21.1_0: and there is a perfected one.
kv2.4:21.4_0: “At such a time, when the stainless, immaculate vision of the Dhamma arose in a noble disciple,
kv2.4:21.5_0: ‘A noble disciple has a beginning that has an end, finishing, and giving up three fetters are given up:
kv2.4:21.6_0: identity view, doubt, misapprehension of precepts and observances.”
kv2.4:21.9_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv2.4:22.1_0: and there is a perfected one.
kv2.4:23.3_0: I was going to the best,
kv2.4:23.4_0: You cross this flood so you can cross to the flood.”
kv2.4:24.3_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv2.4:25.1_0: should not correct them like this:
kv2.4:25.4_0: Wouldn’t the touch of a woman wearing a sharp family on the path, or take the road?
kv2.4:25.6_0: If a perfected one called a fully awakened Buddha, they’d cross the road,
kv2.4:26.1_0: If they’d beat a woman of a perfected one, the road, the base of the road, the label and the road, and the perfected ones, the fully awakened Buddhas could make others enter the road by others, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, or the one who wants to go on the road.
kv2.4:26.3_0: or a perfected one will realize the fruit of stream-entry, once-return, non-return, or perfection would perfection?”
kv2.4:26.5_0: The exposition of the section on regarding others is finished.
kv2.4:3.1_0: There is an uneducated ordinary person who takes their flaws and others; they don’t know the goal of others; they don’t know or see the doctrine of others;
kv2.4:3.3_0: There is one who doesn’t know the counsel of others; and they don’t know the level of others; they don’t know or see the doctrine of others;
kv2.4:4.1_0: There is a perfected one and not others; they don’t know or see the destiny of others; they don’t want to be reborn in the next life; and they don’t know or see anyone else.
kv2.4:4.3_0: There is an uneducated ordinary person who lacks others, and not the followers of others; they don’t know or see others; they don’t want to listen to the true teaching?
kv2.4:5.1_0: and there is a perfected one.
kv2.4:5.3_0: There is a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha, accomplished in the teaching, and training proclaimed by others; and they fight with others, debates, and fights; regarding those who side with the Teaching, and the Monastic Law of others?
kv2.4:6.1_0: There’s no-one who does not make others go about the Teacher ...
kv2.4:6.3_1: Since they have corrected others, both of you and others,
kv2.4:7.1_0: There are ordinary people who make themselves happy and read by others; they make them comprehend the teaching. ...
kv2.4:7.3_0: There is a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha ...
kv2.4:8.1_0: There is no-one who makes others take part in the Teacher’s instruction. They don’t make them grow old ...
kv2.4:8.3_0: There are no ordinary people who make themselves happy and recoil from the Teacher ...
kv2.4:9.1_0: and there is a perfected one.
kv2.4:9.3_0: Shouldn’t they’ve given up greed, hate, and delusion?
kv2.4:9.5_0: They’ve given up greed, hate, and delusion, cut them off at the root, made them like a palm stump, obliterated them, so they’re unable to arise in the future.
